display.back:
values:	none | block | inline-block | list-item |
	run-in | table | inline-table | table-row-group |
	table-header-group | table-footer-group | table-row |
	table-column-group | table-column | table-cell | table-caption | inherit
initial value:	inline
applies to:	all elements

font-family.back:
values:	[[<family-name> | <generic-family>],]* [<family-name> | <generic-family] | inherit
initial value:	user agent specific
applies to:	all elements

font-weight.back:
values:	normal | bold | bolder | lighter | 100 |...| 900 |
initial value:normal	
applies to:all elements

font-size.back:
values:	xx-small | x-small | small | medium | large | x-large | xx-large | smaller | larger | <length> | <percentage> | inherit |
initial value:	medium
applies to:	all elements

font-style.back:
values:	italic | oblique | normal | inherit
initial value:	normal
applies to:	all elements

font-variant.back:
values:	small-caps | normal | inherit
initial value:	normal
applies to:	all elements

font-stretch.back:
values:	normal | wider | narrower | ultra-condensed | extra-condensed | condensed | semi-condensed | expanded | extra-expanded | ultra-expanded | inherit
initial value:	normal
applies to:	all elements

font-size-adjust.back:
values:	<number> | none | inherit
initial value:	none
applies to:	all elements

font.back:
values:	[[<font-style>||<font-family>||<font-weight>]?<font-size>[/<line-height>]?<font-family>]|caption|icon|menu|message-box|small-caption|status-bar|inherit
initial value:	(refer to individual properties)
applies to:	all elements

text-indent.back:
values:	<length>|<percentage>|inherit
initial value:	0
applies to:	Block-level elements

text-align.back:
values:	left|center|right|justify|inherit
initial value:	user agent-specific
applies to:	Block-level elements

line-height.back:
values:	<length>|<percentage>|<number>|normal|inherit
initial value:	normal
applies to:	all elements

vertical-align.back:
values:	baseline|sub|super|top|text-top|middle|bottom|text-bottom|<percentage>|<length>|inherit
initial value:	baseline
applies to:	inline elements and table cells

word-spacing.back:
values:	<length>|normal|inherit
initial value:	normal
applies to:	all elements

letter-spacing.back:
values:	<length>|normal|inherit
initial value:	normal
applies to:	all elements

text-transform.back:
values:	uppercase|lowercase|capitalize|none|inherit
initial value:	none
applies to:	all elements

text-decoration.back:
values:	none|[underline||overline||line-through]|inherit
initial value:	none
applies to:	all elements

text-shadow.back:
values:	none|[<color>||<length><length><length>? ,]*[<color>||<length><length><length>?]|inherit
initial value:	none
applies to:	all elements

white-space.back:
values:	normal|nowrap|pre|pre-wrap|pre-line|inherit
initial value:	normal
applies to:	Block-level elements

direction.back:
values:	ltr|rtl|inherit
initial value:	ltr
applies to:	all elements

width.back:
values:	<length>|<percentage>|auto|inherit
initial value:	auto
applies to:	Block-level and replaced elements

height.back:
values:	<length>|<percentage>|auto|inherit
initial value:	auto
applies to:	Block-level and replaced elements

margin.back:
values:	<length>|<percentage>|auto|{1,4}|inline-block
initial value:	not defined
applies to:	all elements

border-style.back:
values:	[none|hidden|dotted|dashed|solid|double|groove|ridge|inset|outset]{1,4}|inherit
initial value:	Not defined
applies to:	all elements

border-top-style,border-right-style,bord.back:
values:	none|hidden|dotted|dashed|solid|double|groove|ridge|inset|outset|inherit
initial value:	none
applies to:	all elements

border-width.back:
values:	[thin|medium|thick|<length>]{1,4}|inherit
initial value:	not defined
applies to:	all elements

border-top-width,border-right-width,bord.back:
values:	thin|medium|thick|<length>|inherit
initial value:	medium
applies to:	all elements

border-color.back:
values:	[<color>|tranparent]{1,4}|inherit
initial value:	not defined
applies to:	all elements

border-top-color,border-right-color,bord.back:
values:	<color>|tranparent|inherit
initial value:	the value of color for the element
applies to:	all elements

border-top,border-right,border-bottom,bo.back:
values:	[<border-width>||<border-style>||<border-color>]|inherit
initial value:	not defined
applies to:	all elements

border.back:
values:	[<border-width>||<border-style>||<border-color>]|inherit
initial value:	refer to individual properties
applies to:	all elements

padding.back:
values:	[<length>|<percentage>]{1.4}|inherit
initial value:	not defined
applies to:	all elements

padding-top,padding-right,padding-bottom.back:
values:	<length>|<percentage>|inherit
initial value:	0
applies to:	all elements

color.back:
values:	<color>|inherit
initial value:	uer agent-specific
applies to:	all elements

background-color.back:
values:	<color>|tranparent|inherit
initial value:	transparent
applies to:	all elements

background-image.back:
values:	<uri>|none|inherit
initial value:	none
applies to:	all elements

background-repeat.back:
values:	repeat|repeat-x|repeat-y|no-repeat|inherit
initial value:	repeat
applies to:	all elements

background-position.back:
values:	[[<percentage>|<length>|left|center|right][<percentage>]|<length>|top|center|bottom]?]||[[left|center|right]||[top|center|bottom]]|inherit
initial value:	0% 0%
applies to:	Block-level and replaced elements

background-attachment.back:
values:	scroll|fixed|inherit
initial value:	scroll
applies to:	all elements

background.back:
values:	[<background-color>||<background-image>||<background-repeat>||<background-attachment>||<background-position>]|inherit
initial value:	refer to individual properties
applies to:	all elements

float.back:
values:	left|right|none|inherit
initial value:	none
applies to:	all elements

clear.back:
values:	left|right|both|none|inherit
initial value:	none
applies to:	Block-level elements

position.back:
values:	static|relative|absolute|fixed|inherit
initial value:	static
applies to:	all elements

top,right,bottom,left.back:
values:	<length>|<percentage>|auto|inherit
initial value:	auto
applies to:	positioned elements with value other than static

min-width,min-height.back:
values:	<length>|<percentage>|inherit
initial value:	0
applies to:	all elements except nonreplaced inline elements or table elements

max-width,max-height.back:
values:	<length>|<percentage>|none|inherit
initial value:	0
applies to:	all elements except nonreplaced inline elements or table elements

overflow.back:
values:	visible|hidden|scroll|auto|inherit
initial value:	visible
applies to:	Block-level and replaced elements

clip.back:
values:	rect(top,right,bottom,left)|auto|inherit
initial value:	auto
applies to:	Absolutely positioned elements

visibility.back:
values:	visible|hidden|collapse|inherit
initial value:	visible
applies to:	all elements

z-index.back:
values:	<integer>|auto|inherit
initial value:	auto
applies to:	positioned elements

table-layout.back:
values:	auto|fixed|inherit
initial value:	auto
applies to:	table or inline-table elements

list-style-type.back:
values:	disc|circle|square|decimal|decimal-leading-zero|upper-alpha|lower-alpha|upper-roman|lower-roman|lower-greek|...|none|inherit
initial value:	disc
applies to:	elements with display value list-item

list-style-image.back:
values:	<uri>|none|inherit
initial value:	none
applies to:	elements with display value list-item

content.back:
values:	normal|[<string>|<uri>|<counter>|attr(<identifier>)|open-quote|close-quote|no-open-quote|no-close-quote]+|inherit
initial value:	normal
applies to:	:before or :after pseudo-elements

quotes.back:
values:	[<string><string>]+|none|inherit
initial value:	user agent-dependent
applies to:	all elements

counter-reset.back:
values:	[<identifier><integer>?]+|none|inherit
initial value:	user agent-dependent
applies to:	all elements

counter-increment.back:
values:	[<identifier><integer>?]+|none|inherit
initial value:	user agent-dependent
applies to:	all elements
